oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of macroenvironment and microenvironment temperature and humidity on the risk of respiratory disease in pre-weaned dairy calves during summer months
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Louie, A. P.
Rowe, J. D.
Lehenbauer, T. W.
Williams, D. R.
Love, W. J.
Rossitto, P. V.
Aly, S. S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: calves
bovine respiratory disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this cohort study was to evaluate the association between exposure to temperature and humidity measured at the macroenvironment and microenvironment, and the risk of BRD in pre-weaned dairy calves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 242
